title: Media Apps on Xbox Series X Detailed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.02.20
description:
Blessing and Imran kick off the week by talking about streaming apps on Xbox, Fortnite for next-gen, and more.

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:20 - Housekeeping
Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames has been poppin all weekend. DONKTOBER episode 4 (the finale) with me and Barrett is available right now.
That’s not all, last Friday I played through Chapter 1 of the Ghost of Tsushima: Legends Raid and that’s also available.
AND IT DOESN’t STOP THERE, Greg did a special Halloween stream showing off his Animal Crossing island. That’s all available right now over on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Extra Life is happening. This Saturday starting at 10am pacific time you can catch the whole Kinda Funny crew and our shenanigans for 12 hours straight as we’ll be raising money for the Children’s Miracle Network of hospitals. Catch it all going down live right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames.
and also community stream hosting starts friday @ 1pm pt
And remember you can go to kindafunny.com/extralife to donate
If you can’t tell, it’s a busy week at Kinda Funny. So because of the way scheduling is shaking out, PS I Love You XOXO will be posting Friday this week as opposed to Tuesday.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:00 - We now know what tv and streaming apps are coming to Xbox Series X at launch (pretty much all of them) - Xbox Wire
00:16:50 - Fortnite’s next-gen upgrade is coming next week at console launch - Fortnite Team
00:25:20 - Ubisoft detailed which of its PS4 games won’t work on PS5, but now it’s not sure - Taylor Lyles @ The Verge
00:34:15 - Activision Blizzard wants to bring all their franchises to mobile - Alissa McAloon @ Gamasutra
00:42:08 - PlayStation shuts down Custom PS5 Plate company - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:44:42 - Does this prove anything that Sony is thinking of taking a page out of Xbox's book and creating a design lab type website where we can create our own custom faceplates? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:48:10 -  Ads
00:50:35 - A Vampire: The Masquerade Battle Royale game has been Revealed For 2021 - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:55:40 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:58:28 - Will we get more detailed State of Play videos for Miles Morales and Demon's Souls? - Chris
01:01:03 - Squad Up:Beau (Oculus quest 2) - BeauJames
01:02:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tim and Tamoor Hussain from Gamespot
